title: The Princess and the Frog
writer: Ron Clements, John Musker, Greg Erb
actors: Anika Noni Rose, Keith David, Oprah Winfrey
plot: A waitress desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.
awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. 10 wins & 42 nominations total
